attributes.action: Change the BBC's decision and include the Green Party in the TV debates for the 2015 General election
attributes.additional_details:
For those who don’t know the BBC have excluded the Green Party from taking part in the TV debates in the general election next year even though they have allowed UKIP to join the debate alongside Labour, the Conservatives and the Liberal Democrats. The Green Party have responded by saying that the BBC have based their decision based on the party’s past performance in the 2010 General Election rather than on it’s present progress.

Hopefully by gaining enough signatures we will allow democracy to prevail and change the BBC's narrow mind by including the Green Party in the TV debates as they have the right to express their ideas and values like other parties.

For more information check the following sources:

thepoliticalevolution.wordpress.com

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=18btEWRwS7c- Daily Politics programme on this issue

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ghGaYmlj5Z8- Video criticising the BBC about this decision
